item.title: Very large crater of a pothole, 1st March
item.description:
Has been like this and getting worse for many months, spans the whole carriageway at this point, appears to have been reported several times but has not yet been dealt with. May I remind you of your 28 day repair policy! Crescent terrace, adjacent to Yates Bar. ///moment.sober.renew
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
